extractions.description: This paper investigates the characteristics and maintenance challenges of bugs in ML-based systems using empirical data from GitHub repositories employing TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch. It aims to differentiate between ML and non-ML bugs and to understand their distribution, complexity, root causes, symptoms, and resource demands.

title.value: Bug Characterization in Machine Learning-based Systems
title.justification: This is the exact title of the paper.
title.quote: Bug Characterization in Machine Learning-based Systems

type.justification: The paper is based on a comprehensive empirical analysis of 447,948 GitHub repositories and a manually inspected dataset of 386 sampled reported issues.
type.quote: We extracted 447,948 GitHub repositories that used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch. After multiple filtering steps, we select the top 300 repositories with the highest number of closed issues. We manually investigate the extracted repositories to exclude non-ML- based systems...

research_field.justification: The paper focuses on characterizing bugs in ML-based systems, particularly those that involve deep learning frameworks.
research_field.quote: Machine Learning (ML) is a branch of Artificial Intelligence (AI) that has been applied in a large number of practical applications...ML-based systems refer to software systems having at least one ML component.

sub_research_field.justification: The paper primarily investigates the maintenance challenges and characteristics of bugs in ML-based systems.
sub_research_field.quote: Understanding the bugs characteristics and maintenance challenges in ML-based systems can help developers of these systems to identify where to focus maintenance and testing efforts.

name.justification: The paper mentions neural networks as a part of machine learning models used in the analyzed systems.
name.quote: To develop ML components, one needs to implement an ML model, such as a neural network.

type.justification: Neural Networks are categorized under deep learning models.

name.justification: The analysis in the paper is based on a large dataset of GitHub issues extracted from various repositories.
name.quote: We extracted 447,948 GitHub repositories that used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch.

name.justification: TensorFlow is one of the main ML frameworks analyzed in the paper.
name.quote: We extracted 447,948 GitHub repositories that used one of the three most popular ML frameworks, i.e., TensorFlow, Keras, and PyTorch.

name.justification: Keras is one of the main ML frameworks analyzed in the paper.
